name: 黃柏鈞
objective:
本課程由老師指導技優學生選定研究題目，培養實務能力，進行問題定義、分析、設計與製作。專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品。

The objective of this project is to let students implement a web-based text editor that is equipped with specific supports for academic paper writing.
schedule:
Weeks 1-2. Introduction
Weeks 3-5. PDF files of academic article analysis and content retrieval
Weeks 6-7. Correction and fixing of reverted PDF files
Weeks 8-10. Data mining algorithms for academic article analysis
Weeks 11-13. Machine learning and deep learning for academic articles
Weeks 14-15. Implementation of web-based frontend of text editor for paper writing
Weeks 16-17. Recommendation systems as writing assistance
Week 18. Conclusion of the present project
scorePolicy:
In-meeting participation: 30%
Implementation contributions: 40%
Collaboration and learning attitudes: 20%
Report writing and demonstration of the implemented results: 10%
materials: Academic papers from IEEE Xplore and ACM Digital Library
